text: Ezɨ Sol uan atrivir korotiam adegha korotiar kɨnir mam aru, a kamaghɨn damightɨ, gumaziba kamaghɨn foghan kogham, kar atrivim. Egha a uan ingangarir gumazir pumuning inigha me amizir kamɨn ganasa zui. Me ghua a batogha, Sol kamaghɨn amizimɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ kamaghsua, nɨ aremegha gɨvazir gumazimɨn duam ko mɨkɨmtɨ, a bizir otivamimɨn gun na mɨkɨmam. Eghtɨ kɨ gumazir kamɨn ziam dɨboroghtɨ, nɨ an diaghtɨ, an duam azenim girɨgh.”
